alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:51PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baca and east central Las Animas Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Kim, or 36 miles southwest of Springfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Baca and east central Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
